customer_reviews.title: good train horn
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened the box everything was packaged well, the compressor legs were fine. Really the only thing i needed to install it was some 16ga.wire and connectors, everything else needed was there. On the package it says compressor shuts off at 108psi but it actually shuts off at 125 which is kinda nice. Its very very loud. Build quality seems up to par. Might want to think about superglueing or using poly loctite so the horns dont come unscrewed from the housing. Other than that seems like an awesome bang for buck. I love it especially for 200 compared to others.

customer_reviews.title: Turning heads and watching them hit the floor
customer_reviews.text: I love my new train air horn, after installing it myself. I was anxious to drive around town and sound my horn. I had people hitting the floor and others shaking in there vehicles. I use it a lot at my baseball games, it puts those little hand held horns to Shame. I've had people askning where they can get one for theyr vehicle. I recommend to get one for themselves to experience the fun. Thanks and ready to upgrade to the mega air horn.....lol

product_meta.description: Need to make a big noise, but only have a little room? These train horns can fit in almost any vehicle, but deliver the big sound you need. Don't be fooled by their size . . . they may be small but they pack a punch that can rival any air horn out there. Easy to fit, glistening chrome finishing and tuned train horn sound; these horns are the complete package. Our specialized compressor kits will make you horns really sing. All of our compressor systems come complete with a 12 volt compressor, air tank, pressure switch and mounting hardware. These compressor kits are built for performance and easy installation.
